org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

接口 ClusterConnection

  • 所有超级接口:
    Abortable, AutoCloseable, Closeable, Connection
    所有已知实现类:
    ConnectionUtils.ShortCircuitingClusterConnection

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ClusterConnection
extends Connection
    Internal methods on Connection that should not be used by user code.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String HBASE_CLIENT_CONNECTION_IMPL
      Key for configuration in Configuration whose value is the class we implement making a new Connection instance.

    • 字段详细资料

      • HBASE_CLIENT_CONNECTION_IMPL

        static final String HBASE_CLIENT_CONNECTION_IMPL
        Key for configuration in Configuration whose value is the class we implement making a new Connection instance.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • isMasterRunning

        @Deprecated
boolean isMasterRunning()
                             throws MasterNotRunningException,
                                    ZooKeeperConnectionException
        已过时。 this has been deprecated without a replacement
        返回:
        - true if the master server is running
        抛出:
        MasterNotRunningException
        ZooKeeperConnectionException

      • isTableAvailable

        boolean isTableAvailable(TableName tableName,
                         byte[][] splitKeys)
                  throws IOException
        Use this api to check if the table has been created with the specified number of splitkeys which was used while creating the given table. Note : If this api is used after a table's region gets splitted, the api may return false.
        参数:
        tableName - tableName
        splitKeys - splitKeys used while creating table
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • isTableEnabled

        boolean isTableEnabled(TableName tableName)
                throws IOException
        A table that isTableEnabled == false and isTableDisabled == false is possible. This happens when a table has a lot of regions that must be processed.
        参数:
        tableName - table name
        返回:
        true if the table is enabled, false otherwise
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • isTableDisabled

        boolean isTableDisabled(TableName tableName)
                 throws IOException
        参数:
        tableName - table name
        返回:
        true if the table is disabled, false otherwise
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • getTableState

        TableState getTableState(TableName tableName)
                  throws IOException
        Retrieve TableState, represent current table state.
        参数:
        tableName - table state for
        返回:
        state of the table
        抛出:
        IOException

      • locateRegion

        HRegionLocation locateRegion(TableName tableName,
                             byte[] row)
                      throws IOException
        Find the location of the region of tableName that row lives in.
        参数:
        tableName - name of the table row is in
        row - row key you're trying to find the region of
        返回:
        HRegionLocation that describes where to find the region in question
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • clearRegionCache

        void clearRegionCache()
        Allows flushing the region cache.

      • cacheLocation

        void cacheLocation(TableName tableName,
                   RegionLocations location)

      • clearRegionCache

        void clearRegionCache(TableName tableName)
        Allows flushing the region cache of all locations that pertain to tableName
        参数:
        tableName - Name of the table whose regions we are to remove from cache.

      • deleteCachedRegionLocation

        void deleteCachedRegionLocation(HRegionLocation location)
        Deletes cached locations for the specific region.
        参数:
        location - The location object for the region, to be purged from cache.

      • relocateRegion

        HRegionLocation relocateRegion(TableName tableName,
                               byte[] row)
                        throws IOException
        Find the location of the region of tableName that row lives in, ignoring any value that might be in the cache.
        参数:
        tableName - name of the table row is in
        row - row key you're trying to find the region of
        返回:
        HRegionLocation that describes where to find the region in question
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • relocateRegion

        RegionLocations relocateRegion(TableName tableName,
                               byte[] row,
                               int replicaId)
                        throws IOException
        Find the location of the region of tableName that row lives in, ignoring any value that might be in the cache.
        参数:
        tableName - name of the table row is in
        row - row key you're trying to find the region of
        replicaId - the replicaId of the region
        返回:
        RegionLocations that describe where to find the region in question
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • updateCachedLocations

        void updateCachedLocations(TableName tableName,
                           byte[] regionName,
                           byte[] rowkey,
                           Object exception,
                           ServerName source)
        Update the location cache. This is used internally by HBase, in most cases it should not be used by the client application.
        参数:
        tableName - the table name
        regionName - the region name
        rowkey - the row
        exception - the exception if any. Can be null.
        source - the previous location

      • locateRegion

        HRegionLocation locateRegion(byte[] regionName)
                      throws IOException
        Gets the location of the region of regionName.
        参数:
        regionName - name of the region to locate
        返回:
        HRegionLocation that describes where to find the region in question
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • locateRegions

        List<HRegionLocation> locateRegions(TableName tableName)
                             throws IOException
        Gets the locations of all regions in the specified table, tableName.
        参数:
        tableName - table to get regions of
        返回:
        list of region locations for all regions of table
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure occurs

      • locateRegions

        List<HRegionLocation> locateRegions(TableName tableName,
                                    boolean useCache,
                                    boolean offlined)
                             throws IOException
        Gets the locations of all regions in the specified table, tableName.
        参数:
        tableName - table to get regions of
        useCache - Should we use the cache to retrieve the region information.
        offlined - True if we are to include offlined regions, false and we'll leave out offlined regions from returned list.
        返回:
        list of region locations for all regions of table
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure occurs

      • locateRegion

        RegionLocations locateRegion(TableName tableName,
                             byte[] row,
                             boolean useCache,
                             boolean retry)
                      throws IOException
        参数:
        tableName - table to get regions of
        row - the row
        useCache - Should we use the cache to retrieve the region information.
        retry - do we retry
        返回:
        region locations for this row.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure occurs

      • locateRegion

        RegionLocations locateRegion(TableName tableName,
                             byte[] row,
                             boolean useCache,
                             boolean retry,
                             int replicaId)
                      throws IOException
        参数:
        tableName - table to get regions of
        row - the row
        useCache - Should we use the cache to retrieve the region information.
        retry - do we retry
        replicaId - the replicaId for the region
        返回:
        region locations for this row.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure occurs

                                                            throws IOException
        Returns a MasterKeepAliveConnection to the active master

        IOException

                                                                                                        throws IOException
        Get the admin service for master.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getAdmin

        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.AdminService.BlockingInterface getAdmin(ServerName serverName)
                                                                                               throws IOException
        Establishes a connection to the region server at the specified address.
        参数:
        serverName - the region server to connect to
        返回:
        proxy for HRegionServer
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • getClient

        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.ClientProtos.ClientService.BlockingInterface getClient(ServerName serverName)
                                                                                                  throws IOException
        Establishes a connection to the region server at the specified address, and returns a region client protocol.
        参数:
        serverName - the region server to connect to
        返回:
        ClientProtocol proxy for RegionServer
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • getRegionLocation

        HRegionLocation getRegionLocation(TableName tableName,
                                  byte[] row,
                                  boolean reload)
                           throws IOException
        Find region location hosting passed row
        参数:
        tableName - table name
        row - Row to find.
        reload - If true do not use cache, otherwise bypass.
        返回:
        Location of row.
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs

      • clearCaches

        void clearCaches(ServerName sn)
        Clear any caches that pertain to server name sn.
        参数:
        sn - A server name

      • getNonceGenerator

        NonceGenerator getNonceGenerator()
        返回:
        Nonce generator for this ClusterConnection; may be null if disabled in configuration.

      • getAsyncProcess

        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.AsyncProcess getAsyncProcess()
        返回:
        Default AsyncProcess associated with this connection.

      • getNewRpcRetryingCallerFactory

        RpcRetryingCallerFactory getNewRpcRetryingCallerFactory(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Returns a new RpcRetryingCallerFactory from the given Configuration. This RpcRetryingCallerFactory lets the users create RpcRetryingCallers which can be intercepted with the configured RetryingCallerInterceptor
        参数:
        conf - configuration
        返回:
        RpcRetryingCallerFactory

      • getRpcRetryingCallerFactory

        RpcRetryingCallerFactory getRpcRetryingCallerFactory()
        返回:
        Connection's RpcRetryingCallerFactory instance

      • getRpcControllerFactory

        RpcControllerFactory getRpcControllerFactory()
        返回:
        Connection's RpcControllerFactory instance

      • getConnectionConfiguration

        ConnectionConfiguration getConnectionConfiguration()
        返回:
        a ConnectionConfiguration object holding parsed configuration values

      • getStatisticsTracker

        ServerStatisticTracker getStatisticsTracker()
        返回:
        the current statistics tracker associated with this connection

      • getBackoffPolicy

        ClientBackoffPolicy getBackoffPolicy()
        返回:
        the configured client backoff policy

      • getConnectionMetrics

        MetricsConnection getConnectionMetrics()
        返回:
        the MetricsConnection instance associated with this connection.

      • hasCellBlockSupport

        boolean hasCellBlockSupport()
        返回:
        true when this connection uses a Codec and so supports cell blocks.

      • getCurrentNrHRS

        int getCurrentNrHRS()
             throws IOException
        返回:
        the number of region servers that are currently running
        抛出:
        IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs
